T02D1905:16b-1: pra tishtha bi dhi n'a ma /
T02D1905:16b-3: rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba /
T02D1905:16b-4: dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1905:16b-5: rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa //
T02D1905:16b-6: bde ba che la rab btud nas //
T02D1905:16b-7: bdag 'dra'i blo dman nyid la ni //
T02D1905:16b-8: rab gnas cho ga bshad par bya //
T02D1905:16b-9: rtsa ba'i yan lag rab gnas la //
T02D1905:16b-10: phal cher khrus su 'dod pas na //
T02D1905:16b-11: bum pa'i nang du cho ga yis //
T02D1905:16b-12: blo dang ldan pas chu ba bskyed bya //
T02D1905:16b-13: mi nag zhabs med mchu 'phyang ba //
T02D1905:16b-14: lnga dang bcu dang bcu dgu'o //
T02D1905:16b-15: lnga po'i rim pa 'di yin te //
T02D1905:16b-16: gsang ba 'dus par mngon gsungs pa //
T02D1905:16b-17: sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sras sogs rnams //
T02D1905:16b-18: de rnams phyag mtshan shes par bya //
T02D1905:16b-19: de las gzhan pa'i rigs 'di yin //
T02D1905:16b-20: sa gnon dang ni byang chub mchog / mchog sbyin bsam gtan skyabs sbyin rnams //
T02D1905:16b-21: mi bskyod rtag pa rin chen dang /
T02D1905:16b-22: dpag med don yod grub rnams kyi'o //
T02D1905:16b-23: sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos bshad rgya //
T02D1905:16b-24: byang chub mchog gis bsdus gyur pa'o //
T02D1905:16b-25: des na rdo rje gdan sogs kyis //
T02D1905:16b-26: mi bskyod sogs kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1905:17a-2: gsung gi rdo rje'i bdag nyid gsal //
T02D1905:17a-3: rdo rje chos su rtag tu bya //
T02D1905:17a-4: de la sogs pa'i tshig gis kyang //
T02D1905:17a-5: mchod rten gtsang khang byur bu dang //
T02D1905:17a-6: mchod rten gyi ni bye brag rnams //
T02D1905:17a-7: rtag pa yi ni bdag nyid do //
T02D1905:17a-8: byang chub sems dpa' la sogs gang //
T02D1905:17a-9: bya ba'i rgyud la sogs dang mthun //
T02D1905:17a-10: 'dus pa las gsungs de nyid kyi //
T02D1905:17a-11: rgyal sras rnams kyis yang dag bzung //
T02D1905:17a-12: sgyu 'phrul dra sogs bltas nas ni //
T02D1905:17a-13: de bzhin gzhan gyi rigs kyi rim //
T02D1905:17a-14: 'dus pa'i cho gar bya ba ste //
T02D1905:17a-15: slar yang mi shes pa yi rigs //
T02D1905:17a-16: rdo rje thugs kyis bzung nas ni //
T02D1905:17a-17: phyag mtshan nyid ni yang dag bri //
T02D1905:17a-18: gtso bo'i mgrin bar bri bar bya //
T02D1905:17a-19: logs su bde gshegs bzhi phyag mtshan //
T02D1905:17a-20: gcig la cho ga'i rim pas so //
T02D1905:17a-21: rdo rje gzugs sogs phyag mtshan ni //
T02D1905:17a-22: drug po cig car de bzhin gcig / khro bo
T02D1905:17a-23: gsum brtags bgegs dgra gcig / bcu yi phyogs la
T02D1905:17a-24: lha mo bzhi // de bzhin phyag mtshan re re la'o //
T02D1905:17a-25: khro bo rnams kyang so sor ro //
T02D1905:17a-26: lhag ma rnams ni sngar bzhin bri //
T02D1905:17a-27: slar yang bcu dgu'i phyogs la ni //
T02D1905:17a-28: grangs ni ji bzhin bri bar bya //
T02D1905:17a-29: slar yang kha cig nyi shur 'dod //
T02D1905:17a-30: las kun byed pa bsnan pas so //
T02D1905:17a-31: me tog dri zhim ldan pa dang //
T02D1905:17a-32: mgrin pa gos kyis dkris pa dang //
T02D1905:17a-33: cung zad chu ldan aa mrar ldan //
T02D1905:17a-34: go rims ji bzhin rnam par gzhag / g-yon du aa mra la sogs dgod //
T02D1905:17a-35: 'dug nas gtor ma yang dag sbyin //
T02D1905:17a-36: mu tig dngul dang gser zhes grags //
T02D1905:17a-37: mu men dang ni byi ru rnams //
T02D1905:17a-39: bri ha sti dang ka rni ka / nas dang gro dang so ba dang /
T02D1905:17a-40: til dang sran gre'u mngon par brjod //
T02D1905:17a-41: 'bru lnga dang ni sman lnga dang //
T02D1905:17a-42: rin chen 'di rnams kyis khengs pa //
T02D1905:17a-43: rang gi lha yi gzugs kyis ni //
T02D1905:17a-44: chu dang ldan par bskyed nas ni //
T02D1905:17a-45: kun du nyung ba'i chu blugs nas //
T02D1905:17a-46: kham phor rnam rgyal zhes brjod la //
T02D1905:17a-47: de ni bam las byung ba yi //
T02D1905:17a-48: rin chen rang bzhin bum steng gzhag / rtsa ba'i phyag mtshan gyis bskyed ba'i //
T02D1905:17a-49: dam tshig dkyil 'khor bdag nyid la //
T02D1905:17b-0: ye shes @17b dkyil 'khor bkug nas ni //
T02D1905:17b-1: zhabs bsil la sogs rim bzhin no //
T02D1905:17b-2: dam tshig dang ni lhan cig tu //
T02D1905:17b-3: byas nas mnyes bya mchod pa'o //
T02D1905:17b-4: me tog spos sogs phyi yis kyang //
T02D1905:17b-5: rab tu 'bad de yang dag mchod //
T02D1905:17b-6: dril bu dkrol bya de yi ni //
T02D1905:17b-7: bstod pa byas te bzlas ba bya //
T02D1905:17b-8: gcig tu g-yon ba'i khu tshur bcings //
T02D1905:17b-9: rdo rje me tog gis bcings nas //
T02D1905:17b-10: bum pa chu yis gang ba ni //
T02D1905:17b-11: kham phor steng du brtan par gzhag / de nas mchod cing phyag byas nas //
T02D1905:17b-13: chu yi rang bzhin nyid kyis gzhag / yang na bum pa la gzhug bya //
T02D1905:17b-14: de ltar 'di dang gzhan rnams kyi //
T02D1905:17b-15: thams cad so sor byas nas ni //
T02D1905:17b-16: me tog spos sogs sbyin byas nas //
T02D1905:17b-17: gtor ma sngon 'gro yang dag bsrung //
T02D1905:17b-18: 'di ni bum pa sta gon la gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D1905:17b-19: lhag pa'i lha yi sbyor ba las //
T02D1905:17b-20: don grub chu dang zan rnams kyis //
T02D1905:17b-21: lha rnams rdul ni bral bar bya //
T02D1905:17b-22: ba yi rnam lnga shing shun lngas //
T02D1905:17b-23: byugs te khrus bya mngon bzlas la //
T02D1905:17b-24: dri zhim gtsang ma'i chu yis ni //
T02D1905:17b-25: bkru bar rung ba rang gzugs kyis //
T02D1905:17b-26: ri mo la sogs me long la //
T02D1905:17b-27: gang du las la sngags med pa //
T02D1905:17b-28: bgegs dgra de ru sbyar bar bya //
T02D1905:17b-29: mar nag dri zhim gyis byugs la //
T02D1905:17b-30: skyu ru ra yis bkru bar bya //
T02D1905:17b-31: ba yi rnam lnga sogs kyis byug / mar nag gis ni byugs pa gang //
T02D1905:17b-32: bkru bya skyu ru ra yis kyang //
T02D1905:17b-33: d'ur ba'i chun po de 'dod do //
T02D1905:17b-34: chu yis bkru bar bya ba ste //
T02D1905:17b-35: yang na bsgrubs pa'i chu yis kyang //
T02D1905:17b-36: de la 'di ni mar nag gi sngags te /
T02D1905:17b-37: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya bi sho dha ne sv'a h'a //
T02D1905:17b-38: ras 'jam po yis dbyi bar bya //
T02D1905:17b-39: ji ltar nus pas gos sogs sbyin //
T02D1905:17b-40: ye shes sems dpa'i snying 'od kyis //
T02D1905:17b-41: lha rnams bkug nas bzhugs par bya ;
T02D1905:17b-42: / sangs rgyas dang gzhan de yi sras //
T02D1905:17b-43: bstan pa la ni dga' rnams la'ang //
T02D1905:17b-44: ku sha'i chun pos bsang gtor bya //
T02D1905:17b-45: zhabs bsil sogs kyis de rnams mchod //
T02D1905:17b-46: mchod sogs byas nas de rnams la //
T02D1905:17b-47: pus mo btsugs te yang dag gnas //
T02D1905:18a-2: spos phor g-yas su gzung bar bya //
T02D1905:18a-3: bcom ldan 'jam pa'i rdo rje khyod //
T02D1905:18a-4: rig pa'i rgyal po phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D1905:18a-5: bcom ldan snying rje'i dag nyid can //
T02D1905:18a-6: bdag ni rab gnas bgyi bar 'tshal //
T02D1905:18a-7: slob ma la ni brtse don dang //
T02D1905:18a-8: khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i ched //
T02D1905:18a-9: sems can bsod nams 'phel don dang //
T02D1905:18a-10: byang chub sems ni spel don du //
T02D1905:18a-11: bcom ldan bdag la thugs brtse bas //
T02D1905:18a-12: bka' drin gyis ni bskyab pa'i rigs //
T02D1905:18a-13: sangs rgyas rnams ni bdag la dgongs //
T02D1905:18a-14: byang chub sems sogs rang bzhin rnams //
T02D1905:18a-15: bstan la mngon par dga' ba gzhan //
T02D1905:18a-16: gang dag rdo rje'i mig can rnams //
T02D1905:18a-17: rdo rje 'chang chen che ge bdag / rab gnas che ge mo 'di yang //
T02D1905:18a-18: bdag gis bgyi bas khyed rnams kyis //
T02D1905:18a-19: byin gyis brlab ni bgyi bar rigs //
T02D1905:18a-20: ting 'dzin gsum dang ldan pa yis //
T02D1905:18a-21: lugs sku la sogs bskyed par bya //
T02D1905:18a-22: 'dab ma dang bcas chu yis ni //
T02D1905:18a-23: mnyam par bzhag pas khrus byas nas //
T02D1905:18a-24: mchod pa sngon 'gro de yis ni //
T02D1905:18a-25: sngags kyis mngon par bsngags par bya //
T02D1905:18a-26: phyag byas mchod pa sogs byas nas //
T02D1905:18a-27: slar yang nye bar spyod pa lnga //
T02D1905:18a-28: nad par byon par bzhed pa yis //
T02D1905:18a-29: ye shes 'khor lo gshegs su gsol //
T02D1905:18a-30: 'di ni lha sta gon la gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D1905:18a-31: nang par sta gon bya ba la //
T02D1905:18a-32: rdul bral la sogs byas nas ni //
T02D1905:18a-33: sangs rgyas la sogs sngar bkug nas //
T02D1905:18a-34: zhabs bsil byas te mchod par bya //
T02D1905:18a-35: spos phor bzung nas bus btsugs te //
T02D1905:18a-36: tshigs bcad sngon gsungs brjod par bya //
T02D1905:18a-37: bgyi ba'i tshig ni bor nas ni //
T02D1905:18a-38: bgyid par 'tshal zhes brjod par bya //
T02D1905:18a-39: ting 'dzin gsum la sbyar byas nas //
T02D1905:18a-40: mnyam par gzhag pas bsam par bya //
T02D1905:18a-41: bum pas khrus bya mang po yis //
T02D1905:18a-42: bkra shis sgra ni sngon 'gro bas //
T02D1905:18a-43: de la 'di ni khrus kyi sngags te /
T02D1905:18a-44: ji ltar bltams ma thag tu ni //
T02D1905:18a-45: de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol ltar //
T02D1905:18a-46: lha rdzas chu ni dag pa yis //
T02D1905:18b-0: de bzhin bdag gis khrus @18b gsol lo //
T02D1905:18b-1: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka ta sa ma ya shri ye h'um /
T02D1905:18b-2: gos sogs rang rang sngags kyis ni //
T02D1905:18b-3: mnyam par bzhag pas brtan par bya //
T02D1905:18b-4: yang na rang gi sngags kyis sbyin //
T02D1905:18b-5: lhag par bzlas nas gtso la 'dud //
T02D1905:18b-6: de la 'di rnams na rang rang gi sngags te /
T02D1905:18b-7: aom badzra p'a sa se sv'a h'a /
T02D1905:18b-8: aom badzra dh'u pe sv'a h'a /
T02D1905:18b-10: aom badzra nee bi dhye h'um /
T02D1905:18b-12: aom badzra sarba a'a ba ra na bi shodha ne sv'a h'a /
T02D1905:18b-13: snod ni gser gyi rang bzhin nam //
T02D1905:18b-14: dngul gyi rang bzhin mnyam bzhag pas //
T02D1905:18b-15: bgegs dgra'i sngags kyis yang dag bsgrub //
T02D1905:18b-16: mar dang sbrang rtsis byugs pa yi //
T02D1905:18b-17: gser gyi thur mas mig dbye ste //
T02D1905:18b-18: yang na bsam gtan dag gis bya //
T02D1905:18b-19: sbyin sreg mes bsgrubs zas kyis ni //
T02D1905:18b-20: de ma thag tu gsol bar bya //
T02D1905:18b-21: de la 'di ni mig gnyis dbye ba'i sngags te /
T02D1905:18b-22: aom tsakshu tsakshu sa manta tsukshu bi sho dha sv'a h'a /
T02D1905:18b-23: aom d'i be aanne sa m'a dhi dhy'a na pr'i na ni sv'a h'a /
T02D1905:18b-24: 'di ltar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun //
T02D1905:18b-25: dga' ldan gnas su rab bzhugs nas /
T02D1905:18b-26: lha mo sgyu ma'i lhums zhugs ltar //
T02D1905:18b-27: de bzhin 'dir yang bzhugs su gsol //
T02D1905:18b-28: mgon po rtag tu 'dir bzhugs la //
T02D1905:18b-29: me tog la sogs 'di bzhes mdzod //
T02D1905:18b-30: che ge mo yi don gyi phyir //
T02D1905:18b-31: byang chub sems ni 'phel bar mdzod //
T02D1905:18b-32: aom su pra tishtha badzra sv'a h'a //
T02D1905:18b-33: smad dang snying ga mgrin pa ru //
T02D1905:18b-34: rdo rje gsor bas de rnams la //
T02D1905:18b-35: lan gsum bskor nas gzhag par bya //
T02D1905:18b-36: lha rnams brtan par 'dod pa yis //
T02D1905:18b-38: blo gros brtan pas bsam par bya //
T02D1905:18b-39: mtshang lhag pa'i cho ga rnams //
T02D1905:18b-40: pus mo btsugs nas bzod par gsol //
T02D1905:18b-41: 'di ni rab gnas kyi cho ga'o /
T02D1905:18b-43: // / de la 'di ni sbyin sreg gi cho ga ste /
T02D1905:18b-44: g-yon du me tog dkar po dang //
T02D1905:18b-45: ldan pa'i dung sogs chu dang ldan //
T02D1905:18b-46: rang gi lhag pa'i lha yi bzlas //
T02D1905:18b-47: yang na bgegs kyi dgra yi sngags //
T02D1905:18b-48: las kun byed pa bzlas nas kyang //
T02D1905:18b-49: ku sha'i chun po ldan pa yis //
T02D1905:18b-50: snod ni de ru gzhag par bya //
T02D1905:18b-51: bsang gtor la sogs dgos don du //
T02D1905:19a-0: yon chab la sogs sbyin pa'i @19a * //
T02D1905:19a-2: / mandzi la sogs gzhan rnams la //
T02D1905:19a-3: g-yas phyogs su ni pan sha / blag sha dang ni au dum w'a dang //
T02D1905:19a-4: tsandan aa rka bha t'a rnams //
T02D1905:19a-5: yal ga be yi kangka dang //
T02D1905:19a-6: aa bha sa mi gam bha ri //
T02D1905:19a-8: byang chub shing las byung ba rnams //
T02D1905:19a-9: rlon pa drang zhing rtse gcig pa //
T02D1905:19a-10: srin bu sogs kyis ma zos pa //
T02D1905:19a-11: mthe chung gi ni mtho gang la //
T02D1905:19a-12: dri zhim chu yis khrus byas la //
T02D1905:19a-13: mar byugs til dang d'ur ba bzang //
T02D1905:19a-14: ma chag pa yi 'bras rnams kyang //
T02D1905:19a-15: zho zan ku sha so ba dang //
T02D1905:19a-16: nas dang gro dang mon sran gre //
T02D1905:19a-17: sran gre'u 'bras yos de bzhin gzhan //
T02D1905:19a-18: sbrang rtsi'o ma la sogs srid //
T02D1905:19a-19: rim pa bzhin du bzhag nas ni //
T02D1905:19a-21: zhi ba'i gtor ma byin nas ni //
T02D1905:19a-22: sbyin sreg las ni yang dag brtsam //
T02D1905:19a-23: mtho gang gting du brkos byas nas //
T02D1905:19a-24: khru gang 'khor lo zlum po la //
T02D1905:19a-25: bde gshegs bzhi yi phyag mtshan dang //
T02D1905:19a-26: bdag po'i phyag mtshan dbus su'o //
T02D1905:19a-27: de bzhin dbus su bgegs kyi dgra //
T02D1905:19a-28: las kun byed pa'i phyag mtshan no //
T02D1905:19a-30: ngos bzhi sor bzhi por nas ni //
T02D1905:19a-31: de yi tshad kyang kha khyer la //
T02D1905:19a-32: padma'i phreng bas bskor bar bya //
T02D1905:19a-33: rdo rje phreng ba yongs brtsigs pas //
T02D1905:19a-34: phyi rol kha khyer kun du bskor //
T02D1905:19a-35: 'og gi phyag mtshan phyi rol du //
T02D1905:19a-36: rdo rje phreng ba gang smra ba //
T02D1905:19a-37: de rnams phyag mtshan gzhan dag gi //
T02D1905:19a-38: rtsa ba'i phyag mtshan las cung zad //
T02D1905:19a-39: de bzhin du yang bzang zhabs kyis //
T02D1905:19a-40: sor ni brgyad dang gcig gi tshad //
T02D1905:19a-41: mchu dang rngams su rtsa ba yi //
T02D1905:19a-42: phyag mtshan shin tu brtan pas na //
T02D1905:19a-43: de bzhin du ni gzhan dag kyang //
T02D1905:19a-45: yang na bdag po'i 'bras bu ni //
T02D1905:19a-46: che la gzhan ni dman pa yi ;
T02D1905:19a-47: / phyag mtshan zhes su brjod pa ni //
T02D1905:19a-48: ri mo'i dkyil 'khor ji ltar mnyam //
T02D1905:19a-49: phyag mtshan rnams kyi brgal ba 'di //
T02D1905:19a-50: lan ni ji ltar 'debs par byed //
T02D1905:19a-51: der yang mkhas pas mi mnyam par //
T02D1905:19a-52: skyes bu dam pas 'dod ma yin //
T02D1905:19a-53: phyi rol rdo rje 'phro ba yis //
T02D1905:19b-1: de rnams phyag mtshan la ltos nas //
T02D1905:19b-2: de bzhin phyi rol bsgral 'dod na //
T02D1905:19b-3: 'bras bu med cing dka' ba skye //
T02D1905:19b-4: blo ldan ji ltar nye bar brten //
T02D1905:19b-5: lung dang rigs pas sgrub byed pa //
T02D1905:19b-6: phyogs 'di la ni yod ma yin //
T02D1905:19b-7: skyon yang cung zad byin pa ste //
T02D1905:19b-8: rgya che mang pos ci zhig bya //
T02D1905:19b-9: de ltar bstan pa'i thab khung du //
T02D1905:19b-10: sngags kyis sbar ba'i me la ni //
T02D1905:19b-11: 'bar ba'i ched du mar ni blugs //
T02D1905:19b-12: de la 'dir ni me sbar ba'i sngags te /
T02D1905:19b-13: aom dzva la dzva la h'um h'um /
T02D1905:19b-14: shar phyogs kha bstan ku sha rnams //
T02D1905:19b-15: g-yas skor gyis ni sbyin par bya ;
T02D1905:19b-16: / re re nas ni shar phyogs rtse //
T02D1905:19b-17: thab khung ku shas dgab par bya //
T02D1905:19b-18: thab khung bdag med par dmigs nas //
T02D1905:19b-19: ram las byung ba'i ser skya ser //
T02D1905:19b-20: g-yas g-yon zhal ni gang dang dkar //
T02D1905:19b-21: lus thung zhal ni ser po ste //
T02D1905:19b-23: ril ba dbyug pa g-yon pa na //
T02D1905:19b-24: g-yas pa skyabs sbyin phreng ba ste //
T02D1905:19b-26: zhi ba la sogs cha byad can //
T02D1905:19b-27: rdzas kyi rjes mthun me ru bsam //
T02D1905:19b-28: me mtshams nas ni ye shes me //
T02D1905:19b-29: mig gsum ta kkis dgug par bya //
T02D1905:19b-30: yang na de yi rang sngags kyis //
T02D1905:19b-31: bsang gtor la sogs brtsam par bya //
T02D1905:19b-32: de la 'di ni me'i sngags te /
T02D1905:19b-33: aom ae hye hi ma h'a bhu ta nge ba
T02D1905:19b-34: ri shi dvi ja sad ta ma gri hi tva
T02D1905:19b-35: aa hu ti sv'a h'a ram /
T02D1905:19b-36: aa smin sanni hi to bha ba /
T02D1905:19b-37: ku sha'i chun pos bsang gtor ro //
T02D1905:19b-38: lan gsum bar du chu ru gzhug / de bzhin cho ga'i rim pa yis //
T02D1905:19b-39: slar yang zhabs bsil sbyin par bya //
T02D1905:19b-40: de bzhin chu yi mchod yon sbyin //
T02D1905:19b-41: me tog dang bcas lan gsum du //
T02D1905:19b-42: mdzub mo mthe bong kha gnyis ni //
T02D1905:19b-43: dang po mtha' ru mos pa yis //
T02D1905:19b-44: rnal 'byor ji ltar zhabs sogs la //
T02D1905:19b-45: blo yis zhabs bsil sogs brtag bya //
T02D1905:19b-46: kun du lus la bsang gtor sbyin //
T02D1905:19b-47: zhabs bsil ni gnyis la yang //
T02D1905:19b-48: blo yis zhabs bsil zhal du ste //
T02D1905:19b-49: spyi bor yon chab dbul ba bya //
T02D1905:19b-50: de la 'di ni mchod pa'i rim //
T02D1905:19b-51: me tog spyi bor mar me sogs //
T02D1905:19b-52: mdun du dri zhim brang du'o //
T02D1905:20a-1: tshig dang ni ye shes me //
T02D1905:20a-2: 'o ma chu sbyin slar yang gcig / bsang gtor la sogs cho ga yis //
T02D1905:20a-3: cho ga 'dis ni sbyin sreg bya /
T02D1905:20a-4: chang gzungs 'tsham par sbom pa ste //
T02D1905:20a-5: ring du khru gang sor drug pa //
T02D1905:20a-6: rin chen rdo rje yu bar bcas //
T02D1905:20a-7: sor mo bzhi ni kha khyer la //
T02D1905:20a-8: sor gnyis brkos la rdo rje ste //
T02D1905:20a-9: rdo rje can gyi sor mo bzhi //
T02D1905:20a-10: brkos te chu skyes 'dab ma la //
T02D1905:20a-11: mtha' ru ji ltar mdzes pas mdzes //
T02D1905:20a-12: dgang gzar las ni mthe chung tshad //
T02D1905:20a-13: ro ni rgyu ba'i bu gar ldan //
T02D1905:20a-14: rdo rje dpangs su ji ltar thos //
T02D1905:20a-15: rim brtse lnga rtse gsum pa ;
T02D1905:20a-17: sor gcig brkos pas rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D1905:20a-18: sor gnyis sngar bzhin yu ba la //
T02D1905:20a-19: rin chen rdo rje rtse rdo rje //
T02D1905:20a-20: dgang gzar sbyin sreg shing rang bzhin //
T02D1905:20a-21: blugs gzar de bzhin ni ma rang bzhin //
T02D1905:20a-22: zangs sogs rdzas las yang dag byung //
T02D1905:20a-23: rang nyid sngags las bskyed pa'o //
T02D1905:20a-24: pus mo gnyis kyi nang ngos su //
T02D1905:20a-25: lag g-yon steng bstan dgang gzar du //
T02D1905:20a-26: mar gyis gang ba yang dag blugs //
T02D1905:20a-27: g-yas pa'i 'og tu ha bstan pas //
T02D1905:20a-28: blugs gzar dgang gzar la bskyon la /
T02D1905:20a-29: steng du bltas pa mar gyis dgang ;
T02D1905:20a-30: / lha yi gzugs su bskyed pa yis //
T02D1905:20a-31: ram yig tshangs zhal dgod par bya //
T02D1905:20a-32: yon bdag nus pas lan bdun nam //
T02D1905:20a-33: lan gsum dag tu mkhas pa yis //
T02D1905:20a-34: dgang gzar la ni bskor byas nas //
T02D1905:20a-35: dgang blugs rab tu sbyin par bya //
T02D1905:20a-37: aom aa gna ye a'a 'di bya a'a d'i bya
T02D1905:20a-38: aa bi sha aa bi sha ma h'a shri ye
T02D1905:20a-39: bya ka bya a'a b'a na ye sv'a h'a //
T02D1905:20a-40: dge dang me dge'i mtshan ma rnams //
T02D1905:20a-41: blo dang ldan pas brtag par bya //
T02D1905:20a-43: brgya sbyin gzhu ltar yongs ston pa //
T02D1905:20a-44: mdog sogs de dang de sbyor ba ;
T02D1905:20a-45: / las kyi rjes su mthun pas ston //
T02D1905:20a-46: gang tshe mtshan ma ma mthong na //
T02D1905:20a-47: yang ni bgegs dgra'i bzlas pa bya //
T02D1905:20a-48: rab tu legs par zhabs bsil sogs //
T02D1905:20a-49: byas nas me tog sogs kyis mchod //
T02D1905:20a-50: dgang blugs sbyin bya de bzhin du //
T02D1905:20b-0: yam shing sogs kyis @20b sbyin sreg bya //
T02D1905:20b-2: me yi phung po la byas nas /
T02D1905:20b-3: rang gi lhag pa'i lhar dmigs te //
T02D1905:20b-4: 'di yi sngags ni bzlas par bya //
T02D1905:20b-5: mchod yon zhabs bsil sogs byas nas //
T02D1905:20b-6: mchod yon dam pa sngon 'gro bas //
T02D1905:20b-7: de la dgang blugs sbyin par bya //
T02D1905:20b-8: bdud rtsir byas pa'i mar gyis ni /
T02D1905:20b-9: sngon du bsams shing bsreg par bya //
T02D1905:20b-10: re mos gnyis ni sbyin byas la //
T02D1905:20b-11: mthe bong srin lag kha yis ni //
T02D1905:20b-12: blangs pa mar gyi rtsi blugs pa //
T02D1905:20b-13: blugs gzar gyis ni mar bsreg bya //
T02D1905:20b-14: 'bru yang de nyid kyis dbul bya //
T02D1905:20b-15: med na lag pa nyid kyis bya //
T02D1905:20b-16: dgang blugs dag ni sbyin par bya //
T02D1905:20b-17: bsreg bya 'bru rnams rang gi ni //
T02D1905:20b-18: sngags kyis bud shing de bzhin du //
T02D1905:20b-19: kha cig gzhan gyi sngags kyis kyang //
T02D1905:20b-20: gzhan ri rang gis dbul bar bya //
T02D1905:20b-21: de la 'di rnams ni gzhan gyi sngags te /
T02D1905:20b-22: aom badzra aagna ye sv'a h'a //
T02D1905:20b-24: aom badzra aa dz'a l'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1905:20b-26: aom bo dhi bri ksha ye sv'a h'a //
T02D1905:20b-28: aom badzra la t'a ya sv'a h'a //
T02D1905:20b-29: pa la sha'i 'o// aom badzra ku be r'a ya sv'a h'a //
T02D1905:20b-31: aom badzra s'a ha ka r'a ya sv'a h'a //
T02D1905:20b-33: aom aa pra ti ha ta badzr'a ya sv'a h'a //
T02D1905:20b-35: aom ma h'a be g'a ya sv'ah'a //
T02D1905:20b-37: aom badzra bi dz'a ya sv'a h'a //
T02D1905:20b-39: aom badzra ghasma ri sv'a h'a //
T02D1905:20b-41: gro'i'o// aom sarba b'a bam da ha na badzr'a ya sarba p'a pam da ha sv'a h'a //
T02D1905:20b-43: aom ma h'a ba l'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1905:20b-45: aom badzra a'a yu she sv'a h'a /
T02D1905:20b-47: aom badzra pushta ye sv'a h'a /
T02D1905:20b-49: aom badzra sam pa de sv'a h'a /
T02D1905:20b-52: byas nas sngar bzhin mtha' ru ni //
T02D1905:20b-53: sngags kyi yan lag ma nyams bzlas //
T02D1905:20b-54: las ni ji ltar nang bcug la //
T02D1905:20b-55: nga la bso nas ni slar sbyin bya //
T02D1905:20b-56: dgang blugs ji ltar yod kyi bar //
T02D1905:20b-57: med na yang dag rdzogs pa yi //
T02D1905:20b-58: mtha' ru yang dag dgang blugs da bul //
T02D1905:20b-60: me tog spos dang gos gsar pa //
T02D1905:21a-2: sgra yis mchod pa byas nas ni //
T02D1905:21a-3: yon phul nas ni slob ma yi //
T02D1905:21a-4: g-yas kyi mthe bo g-yon pa yi //
T02D1905:21a-5: mthe chung nas ni bzung byas nas //
T02D1905:21a-6: rang gi gang blangs sbyin par bya //
T02D1905:21a-7: gal te grub nas rgyal po sogs //
T02D1905:21a-10: yongs rdzogs dgang blugs sngon lta bur //
T02D1905:21a-12: yon phun nas ni slob ma yi //
T02D1905:21a-13: sems ni mnyan par bzhag nas su //
T02D1905:21a-14: snying gar me tog thal mo sbyar //
T02D1905:21a-15: nyung sogs nyes pa zhi don du //
T02D1905:21a-16: bzod par gsol zhes brjod par bya //
T02D1905:21a-17: ji srid ma tshang lhag pa rnams //
T02D1905:21a-18: bdag gis rmongs pa blo bgyis pa //
T02D1905:21a-19: gang phyir lus can skyabs gyur pa //
T02D1905:21a-20: mgon po khyed kyis de bzod mdzod //
T02D1905:21a-21: ma tshogs ba dang mi shes pa //
T02D1905:21a-22: nus pa med la sogs pa rang bzhin //
T02D1905:21a-23: ma tshang ba dang gzhan byas gang //
T02D1905:21a-24: de dag thams cad bzod par rigs //
T02D1905:21a-25: bzod gsol phyag 'tshal byas rjes la //
T02D1905:21a-26: rang gi mngon par 'dod ba blang //
T02D1905:21a-27: rdo rje sems zhes bzlas ba bya //
T02D1905:21a-28: mang po yang ni yi ge brgya pa'i sngags te //
T02D1905:21a-29: aom badzra sa tva sa ma ya //
T02D1905:21a-31: badzra sa tva tye no ba tishtha dri dho me bha ba //
T02D1905:21a-32: su to shyo me bha ba //
T02D1905:21a-33: aa nu rakto me bha ba //
T02D1905:21a-34: sarba siddhamme pra ya tstsha sarba karma su tsa me tsittam shre ya: ku ru h'um /
T02D1905:21a-35: ha ha ha ha ho bha ga b'an sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra m'a me munytsa /
T02D1905:21a-36: badzr'i bha ba ma h'a sa ma ya sa tva aa: ai to ba sarba sa tv'rtha /
T02D1905:21a-37: siddhi dang th'a ya bata su ga gatstsha dhva buddha
T02D1905:21a-38: bi sha yam pu na r'a ga ma na ya
T02D1905:21a-39: tu / brjod nas rang gi sngags kyis ni //
T02D1905:21a-40: yi ge'i nang du bcug nas su //
T02D1905:21a-41: sngags kyis rang bdag mgon po ni //
T02D1905:21a-42: sngags pas blo yis gshegs su gsol //
T02D1905:21a-43: de ltar me yi de bzhin kun //
T02D1905:21a-44: bsang gtor la sogs byas nas ni //
T02D1905:21a-45: de la dgang blugs sbyin byas nas //
T02D1905:21a-46: yam shing de bzhin spyin sreg bya //
T02D1905:21a-47: de bzhin 'di yis zhabs bsil sogs //
T02D1905:21a-48: ji srid nam bza' dbul byas nas //
T02D1905:21a-49: bzod gsol gsol ba gdab byas nas //
T02D1905:21a-50: snga ma bzhin du gshegs su gsol //
T02D1905:21a-51: rnal 'byor bdag nyid mnyam bzhag bas //
T02D1905:21b-1: lha rnams la phul lhag ma ni //
T02D1905:21b-2: phru ba 'dod pas bgo bar bya //
T02D1905:21b-3: di ring phal cher rigs dam pa //
T02D1905:21b-4: ran par 'dod pa yod pa ni //
T02D1905:21b-5: des na 'di brtsams mgon po rnams //
T02D1905:21b-6: thub pa'i rtse mo de bzod mdzod //
T02D1905:21b-7: rgyud rnams mang po gang rig pa //
T02D1905:21b-8: rab gnas blo ni pha rol so na //
T02D1905:21b-9: 'di dag byis bas bstan pas na //
T02D1905:21b-10: nyes ldan bdag la bzod par mdzod //
T02D1905:21b-11: rab gnas cho ga bzang po 'di //
T02D1905:21b-12: rang tu rgyas par yod mo kyang //
T02D1905:21b-13: dman pas de nyid mi rtogs pas //
T02D1905:21b-14: des na bdag gis 'di ru brtsams //
T02D1905:21b-15: 'di ni mdor bsdus yang dag rdzogs //
T02D1905:21b-16: rab gnas cho ga go rims mdzes //
T02D1905:21b-17: 'di byas bsod nams gang thob pas //
T02D1905:21b-18: 'gro ba byang chub la gnas gyur //
T02D1905:21b-19: rmongs pa rjes bzung las byung pa'i //
T02D1905:21b-20: bsod nams cung zad bsgoms pa na //
T02D1905:21b-21: dpal ldan mkhas pa mi 'jigs pa'i //
T02D1905:21b-22: phyag gis cho ga sde pa spyor byas //
T02D1905:21b-23: pandi ta mi 'jigs pa'i phyag gis mdzad pa //
